description: A supposed intelligence officer assigned with the JGSDF chief of staff`s office assisting Gotou and Nagumo in locating and apprehending Tsuge into custody, it was discovered that he`s also a member of the National Defense Family, who had gone renegade after disagreeing with Tsuge`s plans and used the SV2 unit to his advantage in order to arrest Tsuge himself.
name: Arakawa Shigeki
